column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachel - Thanks so much for the awesome review. We're beyond pleased to know we're one of your fave spots in Midtown. We work hard to serve the hundreds and hundreds of folks who come through our door
column2: so it's always nice to get such positive feedback. On behalf of my entire staff
column3: I'd like to wish you happy holidays and a happy new year!
